p: The antioxidant activity, total phenolic content, and total flavonoid content of the LO were equal to 68.9%, 97.7 mg GAE/g, and 1.6 mg QE/g, respectively. Similar result with a little difference was reported by Spiridon et al. ( 2011); Dif et al. ( 2017); and Nurzynska‐ Wierdak and Zawislak ( 2016).
